name: Aero Blasters
description:
It's an invading force of immense proportions! They've taken over the planet, and, you are our last hope. You do have the ultimate battle cruiser - the Aeroflash which is more than an equal to anything from another planet.

Build up your weapons 10-fold and get ready for some of the largest and most difficult bosses ever seen on a game screen. If you get in a tight spot use the Aeroflash weapon which allows you to store up power and unleash it all in one great blast!
